Constructor

Constructs a new instance of the TarzanCore class.

public

Parameters:
string $key Your Amazon API Key. If blank, it will look for the AWS_KEY constant.
string $secret_key Your Amazon API Secret Key. If blank, it will look for the AWS_SECRET_KEY constant.
string $account_id Your Amazon account ID without the hyphens. Required for EC2. If blank, it will look for the AWS_ACCOUNT_ID constant.
string $assoc_id Your Amazon Associates ID. Required for AAWS. If blank, it will look for the AWS_ASSOC_ID constant.
Returns:
bool FALSE if no valid values are set, otherwise true.

Reimplemented in AmazonAAWS, AmazonEC2, AmazonSDB, and AmazonSQS.
